duties_responsibilities.duty: Analyze cloud spend and identify potential cost savings for optimizing cloud operations.
Work closely with Service Delivery Managers, Technical/Solution Architects, and Finance team to maintain cloud cost spend and environment stability through data analysis and creative problem-solving.
Implement frameworks, processes, and solutions to manage and optimize cloud consumption.
Create and manage automated tools to identify cost trends, anomalies, and track budgets.
Develop and maintain strong and mutually supportive relationships with internal partners to achieve joint objectives.
Influence key stakeholders to consider commercial implications of IT decisions for the organization.
Train other team members and support in developing a team with skills required for technology management.
Drive achievement of best-in-class technology cost performance and lead the organization through technology transformation.

education_certification.credential: Bachelors or Master's degree in Business, Finance, IT, or Analytics (MBA/Engineering degree preferred)
Current FinOps certification or ability to attain within 6 months
AWS Practitioner & Architect certification or ability to attain within 12 months
